title: Validate No Destructure Executor
description: Validates that destructuring patterns are not used. Uses LINE-BASED detection for git diff filtering.

mode.description: OFF: skip validation. MODIFIED_CODE: only changed lines in diff. MODIFIED_FILES: all in modified files. Disallows destructuring patterns.

disableAllowed.description: Whether disable comments work. When false, no escape hatch.

ignoreModifiedUntilEpoch.description: Epoch seconds. Until this time, skip validation entirely. When expired, normal mode resumes. Omit when not needed.
